replies.body:
Did you have a previous 14-day ban? If so, this is worthy of a permanent ban, yes, because this isn't okay behavior (even if it's not *that* bad in the big scheme of things), and the 14-day ban is your last chance.

I get that it's frustrating to have an ally you think isn't taking the game seriously, or one who is feeding, or one who is insulting you, or all three. That doesn't make it okay to constantly complain about him, tell him he's feeding, comment on other player's scores negatively, and generally bring down the whole tone of the game.

Well, I forgot that I had a warning because the warning was over a year ago maybe even 2 years. I think that if I get on game per year which contains bad behavior it should not be punished with permanently ban and I never used negative words, if they didnt do it to me first. Should have muted them..

> [{quoted}](name=FapmasterJR,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=QAZ5QKAA,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-06-11T16:26:12.517+0000)
>
> Well, I forgot that I had a warning because the warning was over a year ago maybe even 2 years. I think that if I get on game per year which contains bad behavior it should not be punished with permanently ban and I never used negative words, if they didnt do it to me first. Should have muted them..

If this is the only game on your reform card, your last punishment was over a year ago, and you have played consistently during that time, I would recommend sending a ticket to Player Support. This doesn't seem like something that should have earned a permanent ban under those circumstances.
OK thanks, I have sent a ticket. Thanks for listening.

How often do you play? Time passed doesn't matter if you aren't playing games. To go down the punishment you have to play clean games. If last time you played was a year ago, it's no different than playing yesterday if you didn't play any games during that time frame.
Have you had a two week ban?
Yes over a year ago. I forgot the warning because it was so long time ago. I never usually flame..

Hmm, I don't know then.  The game would be as the 2-week ban is the Third Strike, but the tier should have decayed since then from my understanding unless you haven't played since then, but it sounds like you have.

On a personal note: Sorry about the game.  AFKing to take a phone call is not unacceptable and is something that should have consequences.

A month ago i spammed in chat something like 'Report him plz' etc... the guy was feeding

A day later i had chat restriction on my other account, so i think it is punishable

Well I sent in a ticket, asking them what sentence or word that got me banned. So I will come with a reply soon I guess. But the worst thing is that I have spended so much hours and money at my account.
